text: Fight for Love is a 1989 album by Canadian alternative rock band, 54-40. ==Track listing== *All songs written by 54-40 except where noted. # "Here in My House" – 3:49 # "Kissfolk" – 3:33 # "Over My Head" – 3:25 # "Miss You" – 4:34 (Neil Osborne, Phil Comparelli) # "Baby Have Some Faith" – 5:51 (Osborne, Comparelli) # "Fight for Love" – 2:55 (Osborne) # "Laughing" – 3:51 (Osborne) # "Walk Talk Madly" – 4:42 # "Where Is My Heart" – 3:25 # "Journey" – 7:44 (Osborne) ==Personnel== *Neil Osborne: Vocals, Rhythm Guitar *Phil Comparelli: Lead and Lap Steel Guitars, Trumpet, Vocals *Brad Merritt: Bass *Matt Johnson: Drums, Percussion ==Production== *Arranged by 54-40 *Executive Producer: Kevin Laffey *Produced by Dave Ogilvie and Neil Osborne *Recorded by Greg Reely *Mixed by James "Jimbo" Barton (tracks 1-3 and 5) and Greg Reely (all others) *Mastered by Stephen Marcussen *All songs published by Fifty Four Forty Music. ==References== Category:1989 albums Category:54-40 albums
title: Fight for Love (54-40 album)
